sourcesContent: import React from "react"; import { Helmet } from "react-helmet"; import { Button } from "@material-ui/core"; import SendIcon from "@material-ui/icons/Send"; import { makeStyles } from "@material-ui/core/styles"; import { MainContainer, DashboardContainer, ControlsContainer, ChartsContainer, LogoContainer, MainTitle, SocChartsContainer, EnvChartsContainer, LandFillContainer, EmissionContainer, ReqContainer, ChartPaper, colorRed, ChartTitle } from "./styles"; import { ValueContainer, MapContainer, ControlContainer, FamiliesContainer } from "./containers"; import { Message } from "./components"; import { fontSizeM, FlexContainer } from "../../styles"; import { LandFillSubContainer } from "./styles/styledContainers"; const useStyles = makeStyles(theme => ({ button: { background: colorRed, color: "white", fontSize: fontSizeM, "&:hover": { background: colorRed, color: "white" } } })); const Dashboard = () => { const classes = useStyles(); return ( <> Furniture Bank 2019 What is the estimated social impact of your donation? What is the estimated environmental impact of your donation? What will be the estimated amount of waste saved? Number Icons Equivalent to 15.5 days of avg. Canadian household waste ); }; export default Dashboard;
